title: Revenue of water utilities - United States 2000 to 2015
summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in billion U.S. dollars, containing a total of 6 data points.
In general Revenue in billion U.S. dollars has rose over the Year.
Revenue in billion U.S. dollars is slightly increasing from 2000 to 2013, and finally roughly constant from 2013 to 2015.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2010 and 2013.
Maximum Revenue in billion U.S. dollars, about 53.8 was reported at Year 2015
Minimum Revenue in billion U.S. dollars about 29.9 was reached at Year 2000
